title: Second Christmas: A Second Chances Epilogue
description: This book has been re-published as "A McLendon Christmas”. It is now a part of "The McLendon Family Saga” and no longer available in print/eBook formats.HEAT WARNING: Contains three sexy cowboys who are still very much in love with their wife, love making love with her--together--and spare no details when doing so...every chance they get. Grey still has a dirty mouth, but thanks to Gabby's efforts, tries to keep it clean in front of the children. It doesn't always happen. Recommended for adult readers only.Join your three favorite cowboys for a very special Christmas holiday. Meet the newest members of the McLendon family, catch up with all your favorite characters from DL's 'When Seconds Count' collection, and get a sneak peek at all the fun and excitement in store for their future.This is not a standalone. Second Chances must be read first to fully appreciate the context of this book.
author: D.L. Roan
